My name is Oliver Atwood. I'm a designer focused on the interaction of the built and natural environment. [personal website](https://www.oliver-atwood.com/).

This site is an example site showing how to use Quarto for 
the final project for [MUSA 550](https://musa-550-fall-2023.github.io/),
during fall 2023.
